subject: Re: Order #SSN4242 confirmed
description_text:
Hello This order arrived and has been working fine since installing them on the 26th Dec. However today the patio motors seem to have lost almost all power. I can just about hear them when they activate, but there is not enough power from them to feel anything- quite the opposite to the great feedback they had been giving. I’ve power cycled them, tried a different usb port (always direct to PC, not via a hub). Can you advise how I should proceed? Kind regards Steven On 1 Dec 2025, at 13:40, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
